property.name: authenticationQuery
property.value: SELECT passphrase, CONCAT('${shiro.applicationSalt}', ':', salt) as salt FROM users where userid = ?

property.name: userRolesQuery
property.value: SELECT name FROM roles LEFT JOIN user_roles ON roles.id = user_roles.role_id LEFT JOIN users ON user_roles.user_id = users.id WHERE userid = ?

property.name: permissionsQuery
property.value: SELECT permission FROM role_permissions LEFT JOIN roles ON role_permissions.role_id = roles.id WHERE roles.name = ?
